attributes.action: Present a posthumous Victoria Cross or George Medal to R.J. Mitchell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For services to his country, and for giving his life so that other's may save ours, R.J. Mitchell, the designer of the Supermarine Spitefire, should be posthumously presented with either the Victoria Cross or the George Medal.
He gave his life in designing such a beautiful aircraft, that stood against the tyranny of the nazi's, and it is a disgrace that he has not been honoured by the highest award this country can give him.
He gave up so much for the few, and for the many.

rejection.details: Sorry, we are no longer accepting requests for posthumour awards as they are outside the PM's remit.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
